mapper.select: /* isLayerKeyDuplication */ SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) > 0 THEN true ELSE false END AS duplication FROM layer WHERE layer_key = #{value}
/* getMaxViewOrderChildLayer */ SELECT * FROM layer WHERE parent = #{parent} ORDER BY view_order DESC LIMIT 1
/* getChildLayerCount */ SELECT COUNT(layer_id) FROM layer WHERE parent = #{layerId}
mapper.delete: /* deleteLayer */ DELETE FROM layer WHERE layer_id = #{layerId}
